page.title: 13ST.MARKS SCHOOL,GOREFIELD.
page.content: {St.Mark's school}is situated near the church in{Gorefield.}It used to be a vicarage,but it is now owned by St. Mark's school Diocesan Board.It is a residential school which gives children from London a chance to have a taste of country life.Up to 25 children can be accommodated at one time and they usually stay for 5-day periods.One main subject taught is Rural Studies,but several visits are organised which offer horse riding,ice skating and sailing.The facilities at the school include a classroom, dormitory accommodation,a library and a laboratory.The old stables have been converted to provide extra space.The school is maintained by church funds and the children have to go to church at least once during their stay.
